ygData.subject: Re: prices for enchanting metal
ygData.msgSnippet: I give them an as-accurate-as-possible estimate of my chances. one guy walked to me with 4 jades and 4 silver bars. I made 2, and failed on 2. I gave him a
ygData.messageBody:
I give them an as-accurate-as-possible estimate of my chances. one guy
walked to me with 4 jades and 4 silver bars. I made 2, and failed on 2. I
gave him a plat to cover his expenses a bit but that's it. I told him before
that my chances were probably 50/50. My skill raised from 28 to 31 with
those 4 so that was really worth it for me.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 11:33 AM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] prices for enchanting metal


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

Don't people get pissed when you fail and lose their materials?


> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> ok thanks. I usually dont charge at all if I get to assemble the
> components
> and they can raise my skill.
> gaining one point of skill is definitely worth it
> Skara
>
